Description: Body sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style patterned pottery chalice with part of cul; white slip; interior glazed streaky black with two pairs of added white bands; exterior reserved; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: The number '184' is written in pencil on the interior surface.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0955) (phase 2)
